replies.msg:
Chapter Title: CHANGE.
Chapter Cover: Orlumbus reading the newspapers with some members of his crew.
We see more reactions to the BIG NEWS!!
Garp, Tsuru, and Sengoku react to Luffy’s notoriety. Garp seems to be proud of Luffy and it’s something he expects from his grandson.
DRAGON reacts as well and Sabo is happy and proud of his little brother. We see more reactions from the supernovas, Bonney & Urouge
Doffy is surprised at first and then laughs at the news from Impel Down.
We see Stussy and CP0, with a commander of CP0 Rob Lucci.
FAKE NEWS Morgans somewhere is happy about the BIG NEWS and people’s reactions.
We see the Gorousei and they seem pissed off
We see Kuzan.
Luffy loves his new bounty and others are still shocked.
Carrot and Other SHs got a bounty increase as well
We finally see Zoro’s team .
Zoro gets surprised, and shocked about Luffy’s bounty and pissed that Sanji got higher bounty than him.
We see the remaining WB pirates and Marco.
Kings, Queens and Princess are arriving one after the other at Mariejois.
We see the new admiral and Fujitora.
仲有新大將 綠牛
白鬍啲人終於出返黎

google translate

章標題：改變。
章節封面：奧爾布魯姆與他的一些成員一起閱讀報紙。
我們看到對BIG新聞的更多反應！
Garp，Tsuru和戰國對路飛的惡名作出了反應。 Garp似乎為Luffy感到自豪，這是他期待從他的孫子那裡得到的。
DRAGON反應良好，Sabo對他的弟弟感到高興和自豪。我們看到更多超新星的反應，Bonney＆Urouge
Doffy一開始感到驚訝，然後嘲笑Impel Down的消息。
我們看到了Stussy和CP0以及CP0 Rob Lucci的指揮官。
假新聞Morgans某處對BIG新聞和人們的反應感到高興。
我們看到Gorousei，他們似乎生氣
我們看到Kuzan。
路飛喜歡他的新款，其他人仍然感到震驚。
胡蘿蔔和其他SH也得到了賞金的增加
我們終於看到了Zoro的團隊。
Zoro感到驚訝，並且對Luffy的賞金感到震驚，並且憤怒Sanji獲得了比他更高的賞金。
我們看到剩下的世界銀行海盜和馬可。
國王，王后和公主在Mariejois一個接一個到達。
我們看到新的海軍上將和Fujitora。
世界銀行海盜
